message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's important to make this offer as appealing as possible. After careful consideration, we propose a purchase price of $950000 for the product. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the significant benefit it will bring to you. We are confident that this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and an attractive deal for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.
